text: “Nɨ gan. Datɨrɨghɨn Babilonia me mɨsoghasava amua, Jerusalem ekɨarugha gɨfa. Me nguibar ekiamɨn dɨvazim boroghɨra mɨtivigh mɨsoghasa nguazim akuvagha dɨvazim boroghɨra dar pozir ekiabav kɨni, egha nguibam iniasa. Apanir kaba me mɨsozima, me dagheba puvatɨgha, arɨmariar kuraba me batifi. Kamaghɨn Kaldiaba Jerusalem iniam. Bizir nɨ mɨkemeziba, da otivigha gɨfa, ezɨ nɨ datɨrɨghɨn dar gari.
